author: Daniel Greene
description:
Welcome back to Fantasy News!
This week we’ve got massive AI lawsuits, publishing drama, awards news, and even the return of Godzilla. From Martin’s ongoing legal fight to Netflix’s crackdown and the latest fantasy adaptations — it’s been a week.Huge thank you to @2ToRamble be sure to check out Austin and Rich's channel! 

📚 My Books:
Neon Ghosts: A Witch's Sin Hardcover: https://shop.wraithmarked.com/collections/standard-editions-1/products/neon-ghosts-a-witchs-sin-hardcover

Breach of Peace: https://tinyurl.com/BoPTLT

Rebels Creed: https://tinyurl.com/RCTLTDG

title: NEW China Miéville Book! Is Game of Thrones Dying? Amazon Cancels LOTR Game || FN
